documents.document: The break. The magic. The beauty. The Rafael Nadal!!! Vamos!!!!!!!! #NadalDimitrov
This tennis is insane #NadalDimitrov
And to fifth we go.. #NadalDimitrov #sleepisfortheweak
But Rafa is also playing well. Always the professional. #NadalDimitrov
A year ago Dimitrov would have stumbled at this stage. Right now he's playing better. #NadalDimitrov
Someone get Dimitrovs coach a drink to calm his nerves. The man has been on edge all match. #NadalDimitrov
That single handed back hand though #NadalDimitrov
When your player is two sets to one up and you still feel nervous. #NadalDimitrov
Just realised it's Nike vs Nike. At least there will be a win for Nike in this... and in the final.
Rod Laver enjoying this one. Hopefully reminding him of his hay day
Serving first in the fourth. Makes it easier.
One more set to go!!
Nadal has got his poor girlfriends heart racing. At least but a ring on her finger to calm her down.
Dimitrov vs Nadal ... the battle is on
Serena vs Venus!!!!!! This is what tennis is all about!
And it's an all Williams final!!!!
@BrendanNg1 your tweets are brilliant. Stop making me laugh
Blink and it's 18 17 in the fifth. Wow @ivokarlovic @HoracioZeballos @AustralianOpen
Zeballos and Karlovic match just wow. Can they both win? @ivokarlovic @AustralianOpen
Puig!!!!!! What a way to win!
Amazing. Fantastic. Unbelievable. Words can't describe. Del Porto with the win @Wimbledon
#NoleSlam #nolefam! Idemo!!! @DjokerNole fabulous game to watch! #RolandGarrosFinal
@rolandgarros @andy_murray @DjokerNole @BrendanNg1 the bromance
Finally the French Open!!! What a match Novak! (: well played by Murray too!
And he's into the semi! Nice job @delpotrojuan !! What a win over Chardy. Rankings mean nothing when your a champ!
HE WON!!! Yes @delpotrojuan ! One match at a time!
He won the first set!!! One more to go! Vamos @delpotrojuan
He's back! @delpotrojuan ! I could not be more excited right now for this man!
@BrendanNg1 can he just marry me already. So adorable.
Lol one more plate and Andy has a whole dinner set. Taking positive vibes from the match.
Sealed with an ace. Congrats on the sixth Aussie Open title Novak! Hard luck Andy.
Murray being a runner up at the Australian Open. Still a better love story than twilight
@SKYNZ Any update? The aussie open final is about to start
Kerber your beaut! What a win! Great fight by Serenaa
Both Serena and Kerber fired up after each point. So intense.
Back on serve. What is happening?
Okay that first game third set... those points. Wow.
Kerber is like great shot Serena. .. but seriously just give me the game.
At the least handshake was friendly. But wow. What a way to dominate by @serenawilliams
Hmm looks like Serena will serve it out from here
Serena serving up a bagel and a bread stick today. What I call lunch. What Aga calls... wait she got another game. Wow. How?
@halfadams who dobs Mike in? This won't be shown for another 6 months in New Zealand.. #behindthetimes
@BrendanNg1 touche!
She got a game! Come on Ninja!
The warm up was longer than that set.
How is she already serving for the set? I leave my desk for 10 minutes. Now this
Wow. Double fault. Aga needs to reset. Down a double break. And Serena is in beast mode.
@AustralianOpen the kid looks the most excited about this match.
A break already! Please don't get bagled. #serenavsaga
@BrendanNg1 tease me on FB and not reply. I come twitter stalk you! He looks so skinny there! Oh those two are a thing
Ferrer! !! VAMOS! Deserved that set.
Muzza already with the break. Let's keep it that way.
David Ferrer the walking red bull! A new one but a good one! VAMOS!
Waiting for 5 o'clock so I can go watch the tennis.. One min to go!!!
Anyone else picking @vika7 to be in the final?
@AustralianOpen @milosraonic @NGVMelbourne @BrendanNg1 he has a gf?????
Just to good by Nishikori atm
@BrendanNg1 neither. That was too much. They can't.
Rafa is back!
Hewitt! <3
@AustralianOpen Oh Ferrer! What an angel!
No top swap! Come on Hewitt!
When is the top swap happening?
@BrendanNg1 ferrer is so sad about Hewitt going bye bye
Ferrer with the traditional watch putting on!
@BrendanNg1 I wouldn't mind seeing them top less. .m
Oh Hewitt we still all love you!
How is Lopez playing doubles after that epic singles match? #BeastMode
@BrendanNg1 yes please. I need sleep
It mustn't be easy the thought of ending someone's career. Ferrer is handling is well.
Oh Chardy gone too! :( his instagram is the best.
@BrendanNg1 yes? But not with that outfit.
Oh no. Absolute heartbreak. Bye bye Sock. Oh and to Rosol too. My puppet is sad :(
On a side note the popsicle is still alive. On to melt on to round 3 in the aussie open
On to set three!
What a game! Good hold by Ferrer!
Both men's tops are just now made of sweat. #hewittvsferrer
@BrendanNg1 no one does. That's why Petra moved on
Good hold by Hewitt. Man Ferrer is a beast
Hewitt is like this guy is makes me run more than my three kids.
I really want Hewitts top minus one star
One set down.. how many more to go? #hewittvsferrer
On a side note. . Come on jack sock!
Hewitts top reminding you that you are playing an aussie at the aussie open. Just in case you forgot
@BrendanNg1 hungry for Pospisil ;)
@BrendanNg1 I told you it looks like an iceblock!
It's going to be a long one. #hewittvsferrer #AusOpen2016
@BrendanNg1 @ESPNTennis @stanwawrinka he somehow looks like a really delicious iceblock though
@BrendanNg1 @ESPNTennis @stanwawrinka Ew. So gross
@BrendanNg1 it's okay. Back on serve.
Rafa out 1st round. Wow. Madness.
Who saw that coming? What a match. #nadasco #NadalvsVerdasco #AusOpen2016
Just a feeling but Nadal has got this one. #nadasco #NadalvsVerdasco
What a point!
Nadal with the break!!! Verdasco looking a little sleepy.
The greatest thing is Hewitt still has to play after this. #nadasco #NadalvsVerdasco #AusOpen2016
I can't stop watching.
Verdasco looks tired. Nadal has this one in the bag. #NadalVsVerdasco #nadasco #AusOpen
Huge congrats to @BautistaAgut for winning the @ASBclassic https://t.co/CgsEV2H1Po
Fantastic win by Venus and Pavic at the @ASBclassic! Let's get the aussie open title now boys!
